front.title: An Example of DIGEST-MD5 Authentication within an LDAP server

abstract.t: HTTP Digest Authentication as a SASL mechanism [DIGEST-MD5] is required to be supported in LDAP servers for password-based authentication (see Authentication Methods for LDAP [AUTHMETH]). This specification describes one approach to implement DIGEST-MD5 authentication in an LDAP server. It does not specify a standard of any kind.
